summary: Header brand mark was switched from an inline SVG to a PNG pointing at /assets/generated/queen-bee-app-icon.dim_180x180.png with 64x64 sizing and alt text, and favicon links (32x32, 48x48) were added to frontend/index.html. However, the diff does not show the required generated image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the static assets requirement cannot be confirmed as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the generated branding images as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the UI (do not serve images via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The code references PNGs under /assets/generated, but the diff shows no new files added, so there is no evidence the required images were actually added to frontend/public/assets/generated.
